title: Pentagon clashes with Anthropic over military AI use, say sources
description: The Pentagon and artificial-intelligence developer Anthropic ‍are at odds, three people familiar with the matter told Reuters.
content: The Pentagon and artificial-intelligence developer Anthropic ‍are at odds over potentially eliminating safeguards that might allow the government to ​use its technology to target weapons autonomously and conduct U.S. ‌domestic surveillance, three peo... [1655 chars]

title: Caught watching Netflix by boss, This Bengaluru techie devised AI jugaad to never get caught again at work
description: A Bengaluru-based techie has gone viral after revealing how he used artificial intelligence to avoid getting caught watching Netflix at work, building a smart system that instantly switched his screen to work mode whenever his boss came nearby.
content:
A Bengaluru-based tech professional has gone viral after revealing how he outsmarted his boss at work using artificial intelligence. Instead of stopping his Netflix habit after being caught once, he decided to automate his escape — with code.

title: Laos reveals AI ethics readiness strategies
description: VIENTIANE: Laos has unveiled its first Artificial Intelligence Ethics Readiness Assessment country report, marking a significant milestone in the nation's approach to emerging technologies.
content:

title: IIM Ahmedabad to get new school on AI; receives Rs 100 crore endowment
description: Krishnamurthy Tandon School of Artificial Intelligence will be set at IIM Ahmedabad. Philanthropist and Grammy Award winner Chandrika Krishnamurthy Tandon, an IIMA alumna (PGP 1975), and Ranjan Tandon sign agreement with IIM Ahmedabad.
content:
India’s AI leadership will not only be shaped by technology but by the strength of our institutions and human capital, the Education Minister added.

title: Former Google engineer convicted in AI espionage case
description: A federal jury in San Francisco has convicted a former Google software engineer of stealing sensitive artificial intelligence trade secrets for the benefit of China, marking the first-ever conviction on AI-related economic espionage charges, US officials said.
content:

title: How to start building a career in the age of AI
description: Recent advances in artificial intelligence and agentic systems are quickly making this ‘on-the-job’ learning and hiring channel vulnerable – much to the dismay of students and young adults.
content:
Internships and apprenticeships have long been effective for graduates and young adults to test their learning, develop new skills and secure employment. For organisations, they provided a way to identify potential hires.

title: Social media, AI key challenges for Haryana police: DGP
description: After holding a meeting with district police officials and then with industrialists, educationalists, lawyers and other social representatives in Rohtak, DGP said that gangsters are issuing extortion threats by using technology and the police have formed a plan to tackle misuse of social media and artificial intelligence.

title: AI, data centre companies will have to compete for electricity in B.C.
description: Prospective data centres and artificial intelligence (AI) companies in B.C. will have to compete for electricity from B.C. Hydro under new provincial legislation.
content:
Data centres and artificial intelligence (AI) companies in B.C. will have to compete for electricity from B.C. Hydro under new provincial legislation.

title: Warsh set to face early reality check as Trump’s man at the Fed
description: Kevin Warsh has pledged to shrink the Fed’s balance sheet and argued that a productivity boom driven by artificial intelligence will keep inflation low.
content:
Kevin Warsh waited almost a decade before finally clinching U.S. President Donald Trump’s nomination to be chair of the Federal Reserve. He won’t need to wait as long before his first big test in the job.
